name: 3D Browser Framework [iOS]
body:
3D Browser Framework ======================= ![](https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/aumentia/wiki/browser/M1_ss.png) ![](https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/aumentia/wiki/browser/M3_ss.png) * Add Augmented Reality to your app. * Full 3D Support. * White Label. * Fully customisable. * Add to your 3D Browser view a radar displaying the POIs around you. * Customise the radar image, POI and POI selected images, North icon, etcâ€¦ * Place it wherever you want..
********************** Request an API Key ********************** To use the framework you will need an API Key. To request it, just send an email to info@aumentia.com with the following details: * Bundle Id of the application where you want to use the framework. * Name and description of the app where you want to use the framework. * Your ( or your company ) name.
********************** Documentation ********************** * [Installing 3D AR Browser](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Installing-AR-Browser-Framework) * [Adding 3D ARBrowser](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/ARBrowser3D) * [Add / Remove 2D and 3D POIs](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Add---remove-2D-and-3D-POIs) * [POI clicked and POI selected](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/POI-clicked-and-POI-selected) * [Dynamic texture update](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Dynamic-Texture-Update) * [Transition POIs](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Transition-POIs) * [Gesture events](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Gesture-Events) * [Radar](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Radar) * [API](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/API) * Exporters * [Introduction](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Exporter:-Introduction) * [Getting started](https://github.com/aumentia/Hello3DBrowser_iOS/wiki/Exporter:-Getting-started)
****************** API ****************** * [API 3D Browser](http://api.aumentia.com/browser/) * [API 3D Browser Radar](http://api.aumentia.com/browser/radar/)
****************** iOS Version ****************** 6.0+
************************* VS Framework version ************************* 1.0
****************** Devices tested ****************** iPhone 4
iPhone 4s
iPhone 5
iPhone 5s
iPhone 6
iPhone 6+
iPad 2,3,4
iPad Air
iPad mini 1, 2, 3
